metadata.subject: France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
metadata.title: Lettre de l'abbé Raynal, a l'Assemblée nationale : Marseille, ce 10 décembre 1789.
metadata.creator: Guibert, François-Apolline, comte de, 1744-1790.
Guibert, François-Apolline, comte de, 1744-1790
Raynal, abbé (Guillaume-Thomas-François), 1713-1796, attributed name
France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
metadata.description: Falsely attributed to Raynal; actually by Guibert. Cf. Quérard
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 28822
Variant of Tourneux, M. Paris pendant la Révolution française, IV, 24880
Variant of Quérard, J.M. Supercheries littéraires, III, column 340
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
